Text: Hey akamaru just wondering whats with the file size of this release 3.94gb
Not sure man, i did the 4096 and ripbot turned it to 3.95... i just left it.
oh it happen to me but it was like 3.98 weird oh its also safe to do 4097 thats where i always set it comes out to 3.99 squezze the most u can out of it
sorry guys, i won't be able to finish seeding this till monday morning.

Video/audio is fine, but absolutely NOT worth 4 GIGS of data.  There are 1.4 gig "720p" files out there (not necessarily of this particular movie - but in general) with better HD quality than this.  This looks only one step better than a 480p DVD.  (Maybe it's the source material's quality, but either way this image quality shouldn't require 4gigs.)
